data.title: See 1
data.copy: Look around and notice everything that is green and blue in your environment.

data.title: See 2
data.copy: Pick out an object and focus on it as intensely as you can. When thoughts arise, let them go and refocus on the object.

data.title: See 3
data.copy: Lower your gaze, unfocus your eyes and pay attention to your entire visual field.

data.title: See 4
data.copy: Pick up an object and stare at it for 20 seconds. Who is looking at it? Who is looking at the thought "I am"?

data.title: See 5
data.copy: Close your eyes. Observe the patterns of light and dark on your eyelid.

exerciseData.description: The exercises in the See category explore the relationship between self and environment by directing your attention outwards.
